participant_1.name: Jordan
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and adventurous, Jordan loves engaging with people and exploring new activities.
participant_1.background: i've three dogs. i like to watch the olympics. i'm in an open polyamorous relationship. i also have a dog walking business. my father was a door to door salesman.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and introspective, Emily enjoys learning and sharing knowledge, and she values her family deeply.
participant_2.background: i read a book every week. my favorite kind of movie is a documentary. i started a new job as a pa three months ago. i'm pregnant with my first child. i live with my husband in pennsylvania.
